attributes.action: Revoke the knighthood for Fred Goodwin- banker
attributes.additional_details: The knighthood 'awarded' to Fred Goodwin- banker- for 'services to banking' should be revoked in view of the catastrophe his actions caused to the banking system and to the lives of 'ordinary' people in this country. Whilst he has the cushion of a huge pension pay- off, everyone else is worse off financially. The person who put him forward should also be named and shamed.
